title: Gasing Guardian
description: Built a physics-based grappling hook, player combat system, and enemy AI for a 3D platformer.

title: Super Nasi Odyssey
description: Developed an 8-way character movement and a timeline-based cutscene system in Unreal Engine for a 2.5D adventure platformer.

title: Seru Hooty
description: Programmed all core physics and timing-based puzzle mechanics for a 3D puzzle game using Unity.

title: Elian's Bloom
description: Coded all game logic and implemented visual special effects for a 2D game in Pygame.

title: Dungeon Escape (Board Game)
description: Designed and balanced a 3-4 player survival horror board game with PvE/PvP mechanics.

title: Midnight Arcade Mayhem
description: Programmed the core enemy AI (sleepwalking mum) and designed the house level layout for a comedic VR horror-arcade game.

title: Paper Adventure
description: Managed a team of 5, designed all puzzles, and wrote the game narrative based on a 2D-to-3D world-switching mechanic.

title: Sugar Slasher
description: Managed the team and programmed core gameplay, including the enemy wave spawner, for a 2-week game jam.

title: Luggage Buds (48-Hour Jam)
description: Created all characters, backgrounds, UI, and cutscene assets in Aseprite for a 5-person team.

title: Seven Days to Feed (4-Day Jam)
description: Designed all environmental tilemaps and UI icons for a 4-person team.

title: Quizzard (Full-Stack Web App)
description: Built a gamified e-learning RPG site using PHP, MySQL, and JavaScript, including a points/badges/leveling system.

title: HR Management System
description: Built a Java SWING desktop app for managing employee records with Google GSON for database operations.

title: Service Management System
description: Built a desktop laptop repair management system in Python with Tkinter, featuring 4 user roles and using CSV for data storage

title: Ajar Akademi
description: Developed a simple quiz web app with teacher and admin roles using PHP, MySQL, HTML, and JavaScript.

title: CC1 Event
description: Organized an online 'Stumble Guys' tournament for 44 participants; designed all marketing materials and served as the live event emcee.

title: CC2 Event
description: Managed a 14-person team to run a physical university game booth, directing all operations and exceeding fundraising goals by 33%.

title: Samsung Internship Talk Event
description: Led a 14-person team to plan and execute a professional internship talk with Samsung, overseeing marketing, PR, and event-day logistics.

title: Scoop-n-Go Booth
description: Assisted as project manager and marketing lead, designing posters and helping the team exceed the fundraising target by 100%.

title: PSA Video
description: Served as the primary actor and narrator for a PSA video educating viewers on the dangers of oversharing personal information on social media.

title: Movie Brochure
description: Designed a professional, print-ready movie brochure for Howl's Moving Castle using Adobe Photoshop.

title: Retail Customer Behavior Analysis
description: Analyzed a large retail dataset using R, identifying correlations between customer payment methods and product ratings.

title: Event Booking System UI/UX
description: Designed a high-fidelity event booking app prototype in Figma, including full user journey from browsing to checkout.

title: 2D Level Design
description: Designed a narrative-driven 2D Unity level focusing on environmental storytelling and emotional pacing.
